titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: University of Delaware Special Collections Department Morris Library, 181 South College Avenue Newark, DE 19717-5267

bioghist.p: George Fitzwater was a lumber and lime businessman of Montgomery County in partnership with Jonathan Thomas. A receipt from a tutor lists his children named Mary George, Jonathan, Jackson, and Matthew.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of business papers of George Fitzwater, primarily account books, receipts and legal documents, including papers for the estates of Nathan Brewley and George's father, Matthew Fitzwater, of which he was executor. Correspondents include Christian Donat, Sarah Fitzwater, Elisha J. Harker, E. Roberts, and Joseph and Joseph Jr. Tyson.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Gift of Anna D. Moyerman.
